page.title: 05NORTH WILLINGHAM _ FARMING
page.content: 5 Farms _ mostly mixed as Wolds slopes tend to be permanent pasture. South Wold Farm has 333 acres of which 223 permanent pasture and 110 Barley and Wheat. 150 Dairy Cows kept are Brit_ _ish Pedigree Friesians, Also 130 young stock reared (Bull from else_ where) and used to maintain herd and partly for beef. The 150 cows milked at 3.30 am & 2 pm yielding 450 gall_ _ons of milk daily _ collected by Tanker. Staff of 4 of whom 3 live in tied cottages. Farmer has collection of Vintage Tractors, oldest dated 1936 Ash Farm is similarly Mixed but has interesting addition in that 6 Race_ Horses are kept & trained, and ridden by owners at Steeplechase meetings _ nearest Racecourse just down road at Market Rasen.
